sceneContext: Post-practice conversation with Rome after a disastrous practice.

ROME_01.npcDialogue: Mind if I sit? I need a minute before I lose my shit completely.
ROME_01.npcAction: Rome drops onto the bench beside you, breathing hard. She wipes sweat from her face.

choices.display: Rough practice? You look like you just ran a marathon.
You can lose your shit. I don't mind the show.
Maybe you need to chill instead of getting so worked up.

ROME_02_SUPPORTED.npcDialogue: Rough doesn't even cover it. Our keeper let in three goals today. THREE. Easy saves that a high schooler could've made. And regionals are in three weeks.
ROME_02_SUPPORTED.npcAction: She leans back against the bench, staring up at the sky.

choices.display: That sounds incredibly frustrating. Especially with regionals coming up.
Three goals? Damn. What's your coach saying about it?
Maybe she was just having an off day. Everyone does.

ROME_02_FLIRTED.npcDialogue: Oh, so you want a show?
ROME_02_FLIRTED.npcAction: She turns to look at you directly, eyebrow raised. There's a hint of amusement.

choices.display: Only if you're the one putting it on.
I meant you look like you need to vent. What happened?
You're cute when you're pissed off.

ROME_02_CHALLENGED.npcDialogue: Chill? Are you serious right now?
ROME_02_CHALLENGED.npcAction: She turns sharply to face you, jaw tight.

choices.display: Sorry, that came out wrong. What happened at practice?
Yeah, chill. It's just a game, right?
I just meant you look stressed. Deep breath?

ROME_03_OPENING.npcDialogue: It's not just about the goals. I'm team captain. My scholarship depends on us making it to nationals. Without soccer, I can't afford to be here.
ROME_03_OPENING.npcAction: Her voice cracks slightly. She looks down at her hands.

choices.display: That's a lot of pressure to carry alone. You shouldn't have to do it all by yourself.
You're going to do it. I can tell. You don't seem like someone who gives up.
So what happens if soccer doesn't work out? Do you have a backup plan?

ROME_03_FLIRTY.npcDialogue: You know what? Screw the practice drama for a second. Who even are you? I see you around campus but we've never actually talked.
ROME_03_FLIRTY.npcAction: She shifts to face you fully, one leg tucked under her on the bench. Her eyes are curious.

choices.display: I'm the person who's been noticing you too. Glad we're finally talking.
Just someone who happened to be in the right place when a beautiful athlete needed a bench.
Tell me about the scholarship. What's riding on this?

ROME_03_ANNOYED.npcDialogue: An off day? She's had an off WEEK. This isn't a one-time thing, and I can't keep covering for her mistakes.
ROME_03_ANNOYED.npcAction: She stands up abruptly and starts pacing.

choices.display: You're right. I don't know the full situation. Tell me what's really going on.
Sounds like you're being pretty hard on a teammate.
What would help right now? Venting or distraction?

ROME_03_RECOVERY.npcDialogue: Fine. Practice was a disaster. Our keeper let in three easy goals and regionals are in three weeks. Happy now?
ROME_03_RECOVERY.npcAction: She's still tense but sitting back down.

choices.display: That sounds really stressful. What's at stake for you personally?
I get it. High stakes, high pressure. You need to win.
Look, I'm just trying to talk. Don't bite my head off.

ROME_03_HOSTILE.npcDialogue: Just a game? You know what, forget it. I don't need to justify my life to some random person on a bench.
ROME_03_HOSTILE.npcAction: She stands up, grabbing her gym bag.

choices.display: Wait. I'm sorry. That was stupid. Please don't leave.
Yeah, you're right. Good luck with your game.
*grab her wrist* Stop. I was wrong. Can we start over?

ROME_04_DEEPENING.npcDialogue: The thing is, I see so much potential in her. She could be amazing. But she's in her own head, second-guessing everything.
ROME_04_DEEPENING.npcAction: Rome stretches her legs out, finally starting to relax.

choices.display: Sounds like you really care about your team. That's what makes a good captain.
Maybe she just needs to know you believe in her. Not just when she performs.
You push people because you see what they could be. I bet you're like that with yourself too.

ROME_04_MUTUAL.npcDialogue: Yeah? So you've been watching me?
ROME_04_MUTUAL.npcAction: She leans in slightly, a small smile playing at her lips.

choices.display: Hard not to. You're kind of hard to miss.
Maybe. You going to tell me I'm creepy or can we call it mutual interest?
I've noticed a lot of things about you. Like how you're avoiding talking about practice.

ROME_04_CONFLICT.npcDialogue: Hard on her? I'm trying to WIN. Maybe you don't get what it's like to actually compete for something that matters.

choices.display: You're right. I don't know what that's like. I'm sorry.
Actually, I do. And I know that destroying your teammates isn't how you build a winning team.
I think you need to cool off. Want me to leave you alone?

ROME_05_PERSONAL.npcDialogue: Enough about me and my disaster of a day. What about you? What's your deal? Why are you even talking to me?
ROME_05_PERSONAL.npcAction: She turns toward you fully, genuinely curious.

choices.display: Honestly? You looked like you needed someone to listen. And I wanted to.
Because you're interesting. And kind of beautiful when you're angry.
I needed a break from my own stuff. Listening to your problems is easier than dealing with mine.

ROME_05_VULNERABLE.npcDialogue: Yeah. I'm my own worst critic. Always have been. If I'm not perfect, I feel like I'm failing everyone.
ROME_05_VULNERABLE.npcAction: She looks vulnerable, picking at the tape on her wrists.

choices.display: *move closer* Hey. Look at me. You don't have to be perfect.
That's a lot of pressure to carry. You deserve to be kind to yourself.
Everyone feels like that sometimes. You're not alone in that.

ROME_05_CHEMISTRY.npcAction: She's grinning, eyes bright with interest.

choices.display: Only the best kind. So what are you going to do about it?
Let me take you out and you can find out.
Says the competitive athlete who pushes everyone. We might be a dangerous match.

ROME_06_CONNECTING.npcDialogue: That's... really nice. Most people just want to talk about themselves.
ROME_06_CONNECTING.npcAction: She shifts closer on the bench. Her shoulder brushes yours.

choices.display: *don't move away* I'm more interested in you.
*put arm around her shoulders* You're easy to care about.
Everyone deserves someone who'll actually listen.

ROME_06_INTIMATE.npcDialogue: I... I don't usually talk about this stuff. Most people just see the athlete, you know? Not the person.
ROME_06_INTIMATE.npcAction: She meets your eyes. The space between you feels charged.

choices.display: I see the person. And she's pretty incredible.
*reach for her hand* You don't have to be perfect all the time.
Everyone's terrified of something. You're just brave enough to chase it anyway.

ROME_06_DATE_ASK.npcAction: She looks surprised but not displeased.

choices.display: Yeah, a date. Unless you're not interested, then it's just... dinner.
Absolutely a date. I don't do subtle.
If you want it to be a date. If not, just two people eating food.

ROME_06_HIGH_TENSION.npcDialogue: I think... I think I need to find out.
ROME_06_HIGH_TENSION.npcAction: She leans in closer, eyes locked on yours.

choices.display: *close the distance* Then find out.
*pull back slightly* Not yet. Take me to dinner first.
*hold eye contact* I think you already know.

ROME_07_CLOSENESS.npcDialogue: I don't let people get close very often. It's easier to keep everyone at arm's length.
ROME_07_CLOSENESS.npcAction: She's still close to you, not pulling away.

choices.display: I get that. But some messes are worth it.
*take her hand* Then let's be messy together.
I'm not going anywhere. Take your time.

ROME_07_DATE_YES.npcDialogue: Yeah. Yes. I'd really like that.
ROME_07_DATE_YES.npcAction: She's smiling widely now, stress completely gone.

choices.display: Friday night? I'll pick you up at seven.
Perfect. Give me your number and we'll figure out the details.
Actually, forget waiting. Want to grab food right now?

ROME_07_KISS.npcDialogue: *she kisses you, quick but intense, then pulls back* Okay. Wow. That was...
ROME_07_KISS.npcAction: She's breathless, cheeks flushed, eyes wide.

choices.display: Worth the wait?
Yeah. It really was.
*pull her back* Don't stop now.

ROME_08_INVITATION.npcDialogue: You know what? Come to my game. This Saturday. I want you there.
ROME_08_INVITATION.npcAction: She's looking at you with hope.

choices.display: I'll be there. Front row if I can manage it.
I wouldn't miss it. You're my good luck charm, remember?
I'll try my best, but I might have something that day.

ROME_08_DATE_DETAILS.npcDialogue: Friday works. Where are we going?
ROME_08_DATE_DETAILS.npcAction: She pulls out her phone, ready to save your number.

choices.display: There's this Italian place downtown. Unless you have a preference?
It's a surprise. Trust me?
What kind of food do you like? I want to make sure it's something you'll enjoy.

ROME_08_POST_KISS.npcDialogue: I've been wanting to do that since you told me I looked hot when I'm angry.
ROME_08_POST_KISS.npcAction: She's smiling, still close, hand finding yours.

choices.display: I've been wanting you to since then too.
So... what now? Are we doing this?
*kiss her forehead* Come on. Let me walk you home.

ROME_09_GAME_CONFIRMED.npcDialogue: I play better when you're watching. I can already tell.

choices.display: Then I'll be at every game I can make.
No pressure then, right?
I'm excited to see you in your element.

ROME_09_DINNER_PLANS.npcDialogue: Italian sounds perfect. I love pasta. And wine.
ROME_09_DINNER_PLANS.npcAction: She saves your number with a smile.

choices.display: Then we'll get both. Lots of both.
Good. I was hoping you'd say that. I know the perfect place.
Should I pick you up from your place or meet you there?

ROME_09_RELATIONSHIP_TALK.npcDialogue: I don't do casual well. If we're doing this, I need to know it's real.
ROME_09_RELATIONSHIP_TALK.npcAction: She's serious now, holding your gaze.

choices.display: It's real for me. I want to see where this goes.
I don't do casual either. Let's be real together.
Can we see how it goes? I'm interested, but I need time.

ROME_10_COMMITMENT.npcDialogue: So... what is this? What are we?
ROME_10_COMMITMENT.npcAction: She needs to know. Can't leave it undefined.

choices.display: We're together. If that's what you want too.
We're figuring it out. And I'm happy with that.
We're friends. Really good friends.

ROME_10_ANTICIPATION.npcDialogue: I'm actually kind of nervous now. About Friday.

choices.display: Me too. But the good kind of nervous.
Don't be. It's just us. No pressure.
Good. That means you care. So do I.

ROME_10_EXCLUSIVE.npcDialogue: Okay. Good. Because I don't share well.
ROME_10_EXCLUSIVE.npcAction: She kisses you again, claiming you.

choices.display: Neither do I. You're mine now.
Good thing I'm only interested in you then.
I'm all yours.

ROME_10_REJECTION.npcDialogue: Oh. I... okay. I get it.
ROME_10_REJECTION.npcAction: She pulls back physically and emotionally.

choices.display: Rome, I'm sorry. I do like you, I just
Let's just be friends. That's still good, right?
*say nothing*

ROME_END_ROMANTIC_COMMITTED.npcDialogue: Yeah. That's exactly what I want. You and me.
ROME_END_ROMANTIC_COMMITTED.npcAction: She kisses you deeply, then rests her forehead against yours.

ROME_END_SLOW_BURN.npcDialogue: Okay. We'll figure it out together then.
ROME_END_SLOW_BURN.npcAction: She smiles, less certain but still hopeful.

ROME_END_FRIENDSHIP.npcAction: She forces a smile, trying to hide disappointment.

ROME_END_ROMANTIC_STANDARD.npcAction: She waves as she heads off.

ROME_END_EXCLUSIVE_INTENSE.npcDialogue: All mine. I like the sound of that.

ROME_END_EXCLUSIVE_SWEET.npcDialogue: Good. Because you're stuck with me now.

ROME_END_REJECTED_SALVAGE.npcDialogue: It's fine. Really. I should go.
ROME_END_REJECTED_SALVAGE.npcAction: She's clearly hurt but trying to be mature.

ROME_END_FRIEND_ZONED.npcAction: She walks away without looking back.

ROME_END_BLOWN_OFF.npcDialogue: *she just walks away without another word*

ROME_04_GUARDED.npcDialogue: I don't really have a backup plan. This is it for me.
ROME_04_GUARDED.npcAction: She looks away, uncomfortable with the question.

choices.display: I didn't mean to make you uncomfortable. I was just curious.
That's a lot of eggs in one basket. What if something happens?
Then we better make sure soccer works out.

ROME_04_TENSE.npcDialogue: Yeah, maybe you're right. This conversation is going nowhere.
ROME_04_TENSE.npcAction: She crosses her arms, creating distance.

choices.display: Wait, I don't want it to end like this. Can we start over?
Fine. If you want to shut down, that's on you.
I'm trying here. Meet me halfway?

ROME_04_FRAGILE.npcDialogue: *she sits back down slowly* Okay. I'm listening.
ROME_04_FRAGILE.npcAction: She's giving you one more chance, barely.

choices.display: I was wrong to dismiss something that clearly matters so much to you.
Tell me what soccer means to you. I want to understand.
I really didn't mean to upset you. Can we just talk normally?

ROME_04_VOLATILE.npcDialogue: *yanks her wrist away* Don't grab me. What the hell?
ROME_04_VOLATILE.npcAction: She's shocked and angry at the physical contact.

choices.display: I'm sorry. I shouldn't have done that. I just didn't want you to leave.
You're right. I'm sorry. I crossed a line.
I wasn't trying to... I just want to talk.

ROME_05_SALVAGED.npcDialogue: Okay. I appreciate that. Let's... let's try again.
ROME_05_SALVAGED.npcAction: She's still guarded but willing to continue.

choices.display: So tell me about the team. What are they like?
What do you do to relax when you're not thinking about soccer?
I really am sorry. You seem like a good person dealing with a lot.

ROME_05_HOSTILE.npcDialogue: You know what? I'm done. This was a mistake.
ROME_05_HOSTILE.npcAction: She grabs her bag, ready to leave for good.

choices.display: Rome, please. One more chance. I promise I'll do better.
Fine. Leave then.
Wait. You're right to be angry. I've been an ass. Let me try again.

ROME_05_VOLATILE.npcDialogue: Just... don't touch me without asking. That's not okay.

choices.display: You're absolutely right. I'm sorry. That won't happen again.
I understand. Can we keep talking?
I really didn't mean anything by it. I was just trying to stop you from leaving.

ROME_05_DISTANCE.npcDialogue: Yeah, maybe you should leave me alone. This isn't working.

choices.display: Okay. I'm sorry I bothered you.
I don't want to leave things like this. Can we at least end on a better note?
Whatever. Your loss.

ROME_05_DEFLECTING.npcDialogue: *laughs* Okay, you got me. I'm avoiding. Practice sucked and I don't want to think about it.
ROME_05_DEFLECTING.npcAction: She admits it with a smile.

choices.display: Fair enough. So what DO you want to think about?
How about we talk about literally anything except soccer?
I want to think about taking you out. When are you free?

ROME_05_CHARGED.npcDialogue: Mutual interest, huh? I like where this is going.
ROME_05_CHARGED.npcAction: She leans in even closer, testing the boundaries.

choices.display: *maintain eye contact* Good. Because I don't usually make the first move, but for you...
Then let's not waste any more time. Dinner? Tonight?
So what are you going to do about this mutual interest?

ROME_06_MUTUAL_VENTING.npcDialogue: Honestly? I don't really relax. I'm always thinking about the next game, next practice. It's kind of exhausting.

choices.display: That sounds lonely. Everyone needs downtime.
Well then, let me help you relax. What sounds good?
Maybe you need someone to force you to take a break. Like me.

ROME_06_ATTRACTION.npcDialogue: Beautiful and angry? That's a new one. Most people just think I'm intimidating.

choices.display: Well, you are intimidating. But in a good way.
Maybe they're not looking close enough. I am.
You can be both. Intimidating doesn't mean you're not beautiful.

ROME_06_BANTER.npcDialogue: You're pretty smooth. Do you practice these lines?
ROME_06_BANTER.npcAction: She's teasing back, enjoying the banter.

choices.display: Only for you.
Nope. You just bring it out of me.
Actually, I'm completely winging it. How am I doing?

ROME_06_LAST_CHANCE.npcDialogue: *stops* One more chance. But that's it.
ROME_06_LAST_CHANCE.npcAction: She sits back down, arms crossed.

choices.display: Thank you. I won't waste it. What can I do to make this right?
I genuinely want to get to know you. Can we start from scratch?
I promise I'm not usually this much of a disaster. Let me prove it.

ROME_06_HOSTILE_EXIT.npcDialogue: *stands up* I'm done. Good luck with whatever.
ROME_06_HOSTILE_EXIT.npcAction: She walks away without looking back.

choices.display: *chase after her* Rome! Please!
*let her go*
Whatever. Your problem, not mine.

ROME_06_BOUNDARY_SET.npcDialogue: Okay. Thank you for respecting that. We can keep talking.
ROME_06_BOUNDARY_SET.npcAction: She relaxes slightly, appreciating the respect.

choices.display: So... can we talk about something other than my terrible social skills?
Tell me about your team. Are they supportive of you?
I appreciate you giving me another shot at this.

ROME_06_PARTING.npcDialogue: Yeah. I think that's probably for the best. Take care.
ROME_06_PARTING.npcAction: She gives a small wave and starts to leave.

choices.display: You too. Good luck with regionals.
Maybe we'll run into each other again sometime.
*say nothing, just watch her leave*

ROME_06_IMMEDIATE.npcDialogue: Tonight? Wow, okay. Yeah, let's do it. I'm not even showered but screw it.

choices.display: Perfect. There's a food truck spot nearby. Nothing fancy.
You look great. Come on, I know a place.
We can grab something quick. I just want to spend time with you.

ROME_07_FLIRTY.npcDialogue: You know, I'm really glad I sat down on this bench.
ROME_07_FLIRTY.npcAction: She's relaxed now, enjoying your company.

choices.display: Me too. Best bench decision I've made all week.
So when can I see you again?
*lean in closer* Want to make it even better?

ROME_07_ROMANTIC.npcDialogue: I don't usually... I mean, I don't let people in like this. But you're making it hard not to.
ROME_07_ROMANTIC.npcAction: She's being vulnerable, walls coming down.

choices.display: Then don't fight it. I'm right here.
*reach for her hand* I'm not going anywhere.
I feel the same way. This is... unexpected.

ROME_07_RECOVERY.npcDialogue: Okay. I think we're getting somewhere now. This is better.
ROME_07_RECOVERY.npcAction: She's smiling slightly, tension finally easing.

choices.display: Good. So tell me something about you that has nothing to do with soccer.
Want to grab some food? Continue this somewhere else?
I'm glad we didn't give up on this conversation.

ROME_07_FRIENDSHIP.npcDialogue: It is lonely sometimes. Most people just see the athlete, not the person.
ROME_07_FRIENDSHIP.npcAction: She looks vulnerable, grateful for the understanding.

choices.display: Well, I see the person. And I'd like to know her better.
Everyone needs someone who sees all of them. Let me be that person.
You deserve people who see you for who you really are.

ROME_07_IMMEDIATE_DATE.npcDialogue: *stands up, grinning* This is crazy. I like it. Let's go.
ROME_07_IMMEDIATE_DATE.npcAction: She's energized, all earlier stress forgotten.

choices.display: *offer your hand* Come on then.
Best spontaneous decision ever?
I have a feeling this is going to be memorable.

ROME_07_FINAL_REJECTION.npcDialogue: Stop. Just... stop. Leave me alone.

choices.display: *stop chasing* Okay. I'm sorry.
*keep following* Please, just one more minute!
*stop and watch her go*

ROME_07_GONE.npcAction: You sit alone, replaying what went wrong.

choices.display: *text her later* Hey, I'm sorry about today.
*don't reach out*
*wait to see if she reaches out*

ROME_07_HOSTILE_ENDING.npcDialogue: *she flips you off as she walks away*

choices.display: *shout after her* Real mature!
*sit back down, defeated*
*laugh bitterly* Whatever.

ROME_07_NEUTRAL_PARTING.npcAction: It's over, but not hostile. Just... done.

choices.display: *watch her go, then leave*
*hope you might see her around campus*
*text her contact info later, just in case*

ROME_08_TENSION.npcDialogue: *leans in closer* What did you have in mind?
ROME_08_TENSION.npcAction: The air between you is charged.

choices.display: *close the gap and kiss her*
Not yet. I want to take you on a proper date first.
I think you know exactly what I have in mind.

ROME_08_ROMANTIC_MOMENT.npcDialogue: I'm really glad you sat down on this bench today.

choices.display: Me too. Best bench in the park.
So can I take you to dinner? For real?
*touch her face gently* You're amazing, you know that?

ROME_08_PHYSICAL.npcDialogue: *squeezes your hand back* This feels... right.
ROME_08_PHYSICAL.npcAction: Her hand fits perfectly in yours.

choices.display: It really does. Want to keep walking? Keep talking?
Let me take you out. Properly. When are you free?
*pull her closer* Come here.

ROME_08_GETTING_TO_KNOW.npcDialogue: Something not about soccer? Hmm... I like photography actually. Landscape stuff, sunrises.

choices.display: That's beautiful. Do you share your photos anywhere?
I'd love to see them sometime. Maybe we could catch a sunrise together?
That suits you. Quiet, beautiful moments.

ROME_08_INVITATION_SALVAGED.npcDialogue: Yeah, actually. Food sounds good. I'm starving.
ROME_08_INVITATION_SALVAGED.npcAction: She stands up, willing to give this another shot.

choices.display: Great. There's a taco place around the corner.
My treat. As an apology for earlier.
Let's start this whole thing over. Hi, I'm... and you're Rome.

ROME_08_TRUST_BUILDING.npcDialogue: That means a lot. I don't have many people I can just... be myself with.
ROME_08_TRUST_BUILDING.npcAction: She's opening up, guard fully down.

choices.display: Well now you do. Want to exchange numbers?
Everyone needs that. I'm glad I can be that for you.
Come to my place sometime. We can just hang out, no pressure.

ROME_08_IMMEDIATE_CONTINUE.npcDialogue: *walking beside you* I can't believe I'm doing this. I never do spontaneous stuff.

choices.display: Then I'm glad I'm bringing out your spontaneous side.
Life's too short to always plan everything out.
*bump her shoulder* You're full of surprises. I like it.

ROME_08_COMPLETE_FAILURE.npcDialogue: *you sit alone on the bench, feeling like an idiot*
ROME_08_COMPLETE_FAILURE.npcAction: This went about as badly as it could have.

choices.display: *text an apology later that night*
*accept that you blew it*
*wonder if you'll see her on campus*

ROME_08_DARK_SEED.npcDialogue: *she turns around, furious* I said LEAVE ME ALONE. What part of that don't you understand?
ROME_08_DARK_SEED.npcAction: She looks genuinely angry and a little scared.

choices.display: *back off immediately* You're right. I'm sorry. I'll go.
Fine! Forget I tried!
*keep following* Just hear me out for one second!

ROME_08_ENEMY_CREATED.npcDialogue: *she's gone, and you just made an enemy*

choices.display: *avoid her on campus from now on*
*try to apologize via text later*
*forget about it and move on*

ROME_08_NEUTRAL_END.npcDialogue: *you leave the park, feeling neutral about the whole thing*
ROME_08_NEUTRAL_END.npcAction: It wasn't good, wasn't terrible. Just... nothing.

choices.display: *maybe you'll see her around*
*that's probably the last time you'll talk*
*wonder what could have been different*

ROME_08_FUTURE_POSSIBILITY.npcDialogue: *you head home, hoping your paths might cross again*

choices.display: *look for her on campus*
*wait and see if fate brings you together*
*text her in a few days*

ROME_08_CONTACT_EXCHANGE.npcDialogue: *she texts back: Thanks. Maybe I'll use it sometime.*

choices.display: *reply: I'd like that.*
*just heart react to her message*
*don't reply, just wait*

ROME_08_TEXT_RESPONSE.npcDialogue: *hours later, she texts back: Yeah, me too. Let's forget about it.*
ROME_08_TEXT_RESPONSE.npcAction: She's willing to move past it.

choices.display: *text: Want to try again? Coffee sometime?*
*text: Friends?*
*text: Cool. See you around.*
*reach out after a week*
*move on with your life*
*see her from across campus one day*

ROME_08_WAITING.npcDialogue: *three days later, she texts: Hey. About the other day...*

choices.display: *text back immediately: I'm glad you texted.*
*wait an hour, then text: Hey. What's up?*
*text: I'm sorry too. Coffee?*

ROME_09_KISS.npcDialogue: *she kisses you back, then pulls away breathless* Wow. That was...
ROME_09_KISS.npcAction: Her cheeks are flushed, eyes bright.

choices.display: Worth the wait?
Yeah. It really was.
*pull her back* Don't stop now.

ROME_09_DATE_PLANNING.npcDialogue: Friday works. Where should we go?
ROME_09_DATE_PLANNING.npcAction: She pulls out her phone to save your number.

choices.display: Italian? There's a great place downtown.
It's a surprise. Trust me?
What do you like? I want it to be perfect for you.

ROME_10_POST_KISS.npcDialogue: I've been wanting to do that since you called me beautiful when I'm angry.

choices.display: So... what are we doing here? What is this?
I've wanted that too. Let's see where this goes?
*kiss her forehead* Come on. Let me walk you home.

ROME_10_DINNER_CONFIRMED.npcDialogue: Italian sounds perfect. I love pasta.
ROME_10_DINNER_CONFIRMED.npcAction: She saves your number with a smile.

choices.display: It's a date then. Friday at seven.
Can I see you before Friday? Or is that too eager?
Perfect. I'm really looking forward to this.

ROME_END_DTR.npcDialogue: I don't do casual. If we're doing this, I need it to be real.

ROME_END_ROMANTIC_OPEN.npcDialogue: Yeah. Let's see where it goes. Together.

ROME_END_ROMANTIC_SWEET.npcDialogue: I'd like that. Walk me home.

ROME_END_DATE_SET.npcDialogue: See you Friday. I'm already counting down.
ROME_END_DATE_SET.npcAction: She jogs off, looking back once with a smile.
